thread.title: Nintendo Pursues Next Level With Mobile Gaming
thread.title_full: Nintendo Pursues Next Level With Mobile Gaming - WSJ

author: Takashi Mochizuki
title: Nintendo Pursues Next Level With Mobile Gaming
text:
TOKYO—In the classic videogames, Mario the plumber leaps across gaping chasms to try to reach the next level. Now Mario’s creator, Nintendo Co. is suspended in a similar midair moment.
“If he fails, it could be game over,” said Serkan Toto, a Tokyo-based game industry consultant. “If he gets past the next stage, he unlocks a completely new market for Nintendo to conquer.”
The company says it will introduce its first game for... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
